src.DSL package

Submodules

src.DSL.code_generator module

Code generator module

class src.DSL.code_generator.CodeGenerator(visit_tokens: bool = True)[源代码]

基类：Transformer

CodeGenerator. Read an AST and transform it into object code.

Example

>>> generator = CodeGenerator()
>>> generator.transform(tree)

listen(expression_var)[源代码]
runpy(expression)[源代码]
service(step_blocks)[源代码]

Action for service. Lark call this method when a service node is read. Its return value will replace the branch in the tree. The default retval by lark is Tree(Token(‘RULE’,’service’), step_blocks).

Methods below are actions too, without further elaboration.

参数:

step_blocks – list of step_blocks

返回:

tuple of step_blocks

silence(step)[源代码]
speak(expression)[源代码]
step_block(header_body)[源代码]

Action for step_block.

参数:

header_body – list of [header, body]

返回:

tuple of [header, body]

step_body(commands)[源代码]

Action for step_body.

参数:

commands – list of commands

返回:

tuple of commands

step_header(step_name)[源代码]

Action for step_header.

参数:

step_name – list of [step_name]

返回:

name of step

step_name(CNAME)[源代码]

Action for step_name.

参数:

CNAME – list of [CNAME]

返回:

CNAME

参数:

val – list of [val]

返回:

the val itself

transform(tree: Tree[_Leaf_T]) → Service[源代码]

Transform an AST into object code in memory.

参数:

tree – AST to transform

返回:

object code, i.e. Service instance

src.DSL.interpreter module

Interpreter module

class src.DSL.interpreter.Interpreter(variables: dict[slice(<class 'str'>, <class 'str'>, None)] = {}, service: ~src.DSL.object_code.Service = (), pwd: str = '.')

基类：object

The interpreter runs the object code i.e. the Service. The interpreter manages a table of variables and use information of the object code to run.

Example >>> interpreter = Interpreter() >>> interpreter.load(“foo.yo”) >>> interpreter.run()

load(path: str) → None

Load the object code from the given path.

参数:

path – Path to the object code

返回:

None

run() → None

Run the object code

返回:

None

src.DSL.object_code module

This module contains definition of all the data structure an object code should have.

class src.DSL.object_code.Assign(var: str, expression: Expression)[源代码]

基类：Command

Assign command is $var = expression.

参数:

  • var – the variable to be assigned to

  • expression – the expression

class src.DSL.object_code.Branch(prompt: Expression, goto: str)[源代码]

基类：Command

Branch command contains when to go to the next branch and what the next branch is

参数:

  • prompt – the string to be checked equal

  • goto – the next branch

class src.DSL.object_code.Command(name: str, *args: str | Expression)[源代码]

基类：object

Command contains a command name and args passed to it.

参数:

  • name – the command name

  • args – args passed to it

class src.DSL.object_code.Default(goto: str)[源代码]

基类：Command

when none of prompts matched, goto this

参数:

goto – next branch

class src.DSL.object_code.End[源代码]

基类：Command

End the session.

class src.DSL.object_code.Expression(*terms: str)[源代码]

基类：object

Expression is a list of terms, meaning the sum of the terms.

参数:

terms – list of terms

class src.DSL.object_code.Listen(time: Expression, var: str = None)[源代码]

基类：Command

Listen command contains the time of waiting and where to store the heard string.

参数:

  • time – waiting time

  • var – var to store the string

class src.DSL.object_code.Runpy(python_code: Expression)[源代码]

基类：Command

Runpy command contains the python code to be executed.

参数:

python_code – the python code

class src.DSL.object_code.Service(steps: tuple[Step])[源代码]

基类：object

A service is a list of steps

参数:

steps – list of steps

class src.DSL.object_code.Silence(goto: str)[源代码]

基类：Command

Silence command is equal to Branch(“”, goto). i.e. when nothing is heard

参数:

goto – the next branch

class src.DSL.object_code.Speak(to_say: Expression)[源代码]

基类：Command

Speak command contains what to say.

参数:

to_say – string to be said

class src.DSL.object_code.Step(name: str, commands: tuple[Command])[源代码]

基类：object

Step contains the name of the step and a list of commands in the step.

参数:

  • name – name of the step

  • commands – list of commands

class src.DSL.object_code.System(command_line: Expression)[源代码]

基类：Command

System command contains the command line to run in a shell.

参数:

command_line – the command line

src.DSL.parser module

Parser module

class src.DSL.parser.Parser[源代码]

基类：Lark

Lark parser for DSL. Used to parse a DSL script and generate an AST

Example

>>> my_parser = Parser()
>>> tree = my_parser.parse("step foo")
>>> my_parser.pretty_print(tree)
parse(text: str, **kwargs) → Tree[Token][源代码]

Parse a DSL text and generate an AST

参数:

  • text – the DSL text

  • kwargs – other keyword arguments passed to lark parser

返回:

AST

pretty_print(ast)[源代码]

Pretty print the given AST

参数:

ast – AST

返回:

the pretty printed AST str

class src.DSL.Parser[源代码]

基类：Lark

Lark parser for DSL. Used to parse a DSL script and generate an AST

Example

>>> my_parser = Parser()
>>> tree = my_parser.parse("step foo")
>>> my_parser.pretty_print(tree)
parse(text: str, **kwargs) → Tree[Token][源代码]

Parse a DSL text and generate an AST

参数:

  • text – the DSL text

  • kwargs – other keyword arguments passed to lark parser

返回:

AST

ast – AST
